Welcome to AioNT's documentation!
===================================

**AioNT** is an asynchronous way to fetch team and racer statistics from
`nitrotype <https://nitrotype.com>`_.

.. note::

   This project is under active development.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

==================
